A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Wow disappointment is an understatement. As a action packed stand-alone movie it was ok. As a movie part of the Star Wars saga it was horrendous. Rian Johnson literally destroyed 40 years of Star Wars in 2 and half hours. How anyone can say this movie was great is baffling. Too many plot holes. What happened to the other force ghost characters??? Did they all go on a force vacation. Either your not a Star Wars fan and this was probably your first one ever or something fishy is going on with Disney and these critics reviewing the movie. Very sad to look back and see Mark Hamill's interviews. You can just tell he disagreed with it all and just faked smiled his way these past 2 years. Disney please give George Lucas a call and mail him a blank check. Tell him you need him ASAP. What a huge let down smh
